example[0]: Ruth moved into our apartment and promptly took over.
example[1]: His only reason for investing in the company was to take it over.
example[2]: Who will take over when the managing director resigns?
example[3]: The drug companies take over the research for the clinical trials.
definition[1]: to take control of a company by buying more than 50% of its shares
example[4]: A consortium of new companies took over the company a year ago.
example[5]: It is a family business and it would lose something if it was taken over by a big conglomerate.
